name: knock-notifications-system
description: Complete notification system with Express.js backend and Expo frontend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../expo-push-demo && npm install
scripts.build:android: cd expo-push-demo && eas build --platform android --profile development
scripts.build:ios: cd expo-push-demo && eas build --platform ios --profile development
scripts.build:production:android: cd expo-push-demo && eas build --platform android --profile production
scripts.build:production:ios: cd expo-push-demo && eas build --platform ios --profile production

author: Samuel Umoren
